name: Lasers, Tasers, and Guard Dogs!
description:
Controls:

WASD: Move the camera

Main Numbers 1-6: Select a spell (You can also click them)

Description:

Lasers, Tasers and Guard Dogs is a reverse tower defense game where the object is to take advantage of your insects abilities and nature magic to reach the end!

Other:

This is my first ever game jam entry and was made in just under 9 days!

Feel free to leave me any feedback, comments or critiques down below. 

* NOTE * There are both WebGL and Windows PC builds. The desktop version is smoother and looks better due to post processing but you have options!
